1.title: it begins with a choice

choices: Helps an elderly woman who has fallen get up
Helps a small child find his/her parent
sits on a park bench thinking about life
11.content:
name: Tanner kenji Morgester

age: 20

Appearance: 6'1, Brown hair, blue eyes, usually in t-shirt and jeans

personality: kind and caring, Blames himself before others, puts other people first

Back story: Tanner has had a Tough life not knowing his father, His mother struggled to keep her only child happy and safe. he never worried her trying his best even at an early age to keep her happy. He always blamed himself for no having a father and forcing his mother to work long hours. In his grief he has attempted suicide twice failing at both attempts. he feels their is no reason to live but that will soon change for there is a light at the end of this tunnel. He works part time at burger king to make enough to pay rent. he works out regularly and helps others when they need it. on his off days he usually walks through the park to clear his mind.

This is where our story begins as Tanner...
11.title: Man

choices: She has found out that she is beautiful and has fallen in love with who she is
She's becoming something else- a transformation
She is simply in love and everything feels and seems different
12.content:
I am happy. Happier than I have been in days, and now that I think of it, years. I feel light as air and the sun's rays penetrate my body making me glow. Glow with this feeling. I stare at myself in wonder. My eyes do not seem the color of sadness anymore, nor does my heart beat in slow agonizing beats. It is racing, racing toward you.
"Look at me, darling! Do I seem the same to you? Did I always smile this big? Did my whole being float in this way since the beginning? Answer me, my love. Tell me what it is that I have found."
12.title: Woman

121.content: She has found out that she is beautiful and has fallen in love with who she is. This beautiful woman feels love inside of her, for the first time she understands what he saw. She can feel it. Inside her heart. In her soul. Who she is is lost in translation. Its a knowing. For it can't be boxed in or labeled. Its free flowing. You can't own it or posses it. You can only know it by allowing it to be.
121.title: She has found out that she is beautiful and has...

123.content:
"I have found the love of my life! " she says
as she wraps her arms around him.
"I do not know where you found me, but here we are...together! You are a gift from heaven. The answer to my prayers!
I asked for happiness and you made me laugh. You caused every smile on my face and I thank you for it!
Please promise me that you will never leave me!"

Then, they joined hands and gazed into each others eyes...so long. She knew it meant forever! Forever is how long her true love will be!
Forever and always!!

info.description: a few rules no vore, gender change,gay, lesbian, or size change. keep this realistic add freely enjoy and don't attempt suicide it is not the right way as you will soon find out.
